name: Brace for Impact
description:
NOTE: Windows/Mac builds look better than web build

Turns out the WebGL build might not support a major shader effect used in the game, so the Windows/Mac builds will contain the right visuals.

A game by worblir. For the Lundum Dare 47 Jam. (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/$227072)

Adrenaline filled chaos. Avoid red. Collect green. Brace for impact.
WASD to move. Spacebar to jump. Move mouse to look around. Press escape to free up mouse movement.

(Has not been thoroughly tested)

Credits

Music by Kevin Macleod
